SELECT.caption: Jenis Bantuan
SELECT.ITEMSQL:
SELECT DISTINCT cast(r.JENIS_BANTUAN as varchar(200)) as jenis_bantuan FROM KATEGORI_PEMOHON r
union
select cast(' Pilih Jenis Bantuan' as varchar (200)) jenis_bantuan from rdb$database

SELECT.caption: Kategori
SELECT.ITEMSQL:
SELECT cast(r.KATEGORI as varchar(200)) as kategori FROM KATEGORI_PEMOHON r where r.JENIS_BANTUAN =:jenis_bantuan
union
select cast(' Pilih Kategori' as varchar (200)) kategori from rdb$database

REPORT.caption: Laporan Daftar Penerima Hibah/Bansos Yang Telah Menerima Berdasarkan Pertanggungjawaban

SELECT.caption: Jenis Bantuan
SELECT.ITEMSQL:
SELECT DISTINCT cast(r.JENIS_BANTUAN as varchar(200)) as jenis_bantuan FROM KATEGORI_PEMOHON r
union
select cast(' Pilih Jenis Bantuan' as varchar (200)) jenis_bantuan from rdb$database
